description: This file defines the Polymer behavior 'PaperRippleBehavior' which adds ripple effect functionality to Polymer elements, including methods for creating, managing, and customizing ripple effects, and handling focus and press states.

methods.name: _buttonStateChanged
methods.description: Ensures a `<paper-ripple>` element is available when the element is focused.

methods.name: _downHandler
methods.description: Handles the pointer or keyboard press, ensuring ripple effect on press.

methods.name: ensureRipple
methods.description: Creates and appends a `<paper-ripple>` element if not already present, optionally triggered by an event.

methods.name: getRipple
methods.description: Returns the `<paper-ripple>` element, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: hasRipple
methods.description: Returns true if the ripple effect element exists.

methods.name: _noinkChanged
methods.description: Updates the ripple's 'noink' property when the 'noink' property changes.
